parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: VocabularyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the custom vocabulary.

nested_items.name: Vocabulary
nested_items.description: A list of specific words that you want Contact Lens for Amazon Connect to recognize in your audio input. They are generally domain-specific words and phrases, words that Contact Lens is not recognizing, or proper nouns.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: A unique name of the custom vocabulary.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the custom vocabulary.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the custom vocabulary.

nested_items.name: LanguageCode
nested_items.description: The language code of the vocabulary entries. For a list of languages and their corresponding language codes, see What is Amazon Transcribe?

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the custom vocabulary.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the custom vocabulary was last modified.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The reason why the custom vocabulary was not created.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: The content of the custom vocabulary in plain-text format with a table of values. Each row in the table represents a word or a phrase, described with Phrase, IPA, SoundsLike, and DisplayAs fields. Separate the fields with TAB characters. For more information, see Create a custom vocabulary using a table.
